Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is truly a testament to our dedication to excellence. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its market value and the effort put into it, I am offering you the chance to own it for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, expertise, and resources invested in creating something truly special. I trust that you will find immense value in this product, and I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
